page.title: 16LEISURE IN HITCHIN (2)
page.content: There is 5_a_side football at Hitchin College. You can watch the "Canaries" at Hitchin Football Club.There are rugby,cricket,hockey, snooker,judo and kendo clubs. You can get a fishing permit at Burford Trout Farm and swim at the outdoor pool. Tennis courts are at King George's Playing Field and Bancroft Recreation Ground where you can also play bowls and putting. There are Beaver,Cub,Brownie,Guide and Scout packs and Sea Scouts and Army Cadets on the Bedford Road. There are ballet,tap and disco dance lessons and majorettes at Oughtonhead Junior School. BMX courses are run. You can visit the new Queen Mother Theatre or the natural amphitheatre at Woodside. Hitchin Museum and Art Gallery also displays works of both local and regional interest.
